doc:
Don Briscoe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don_Briscoe 0 Cecil Donald "Don" Briscoe (March 20, 1940, Yalobusha County, Mississippi – October 31, 2004, Memphis, Tennessee) was an American soap opera actor, most notable for playing Tony Meritt #2 on Days of Our Lives, and, from 1968–1970, for playing Chris Jennings, Tom Jennings, Timothy Shaw, and Chris Collins on Dark Shadows. After appearing in the MGM film House of Dark Shadows (1970), Briscoe abruptly left Dark Shadows, suffering a mental breakdown.He died in 2004 at his home in Memphis from heart disease. Cecil_Donald_"_Don_"_Briscoe ( March_20_,_1940 , Yalobusha_County , Mississippi – October_31_,_2004 , Memphis , Tennessee ) was an_American_soap_opera_actor , most_notable for playing Tony_Meritt_#_2 on Days of Our_Lives , and , from 1968 – 1970 , for playing Chris_Jennings , Tom_Jennings , Timothy_Shaw , and Chris_Collins on Dark_Shadows . After appearing in the_MGM_film_House of Dark_Shadows ( 1970_) , Briscoe abruptly left Dark_Shadows , suffering a_mental_breakdown.He died in 2004 at his_home in Memphis from heart_disease .
